stimulusHtml: How many times will the statement in line 6 be executed as a result of running the code segment?

features.html:
Consider the following code segment.

 

int val = 1; 
while (val <= 6) 
{ 
   for (int k = 0; k <= 2; k++) 
   { 
      System.out.println("Surprise!");   // Line 6
   } 
   val++; 
}
